Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-0553 affecting package gnutls for versions less than 3.8.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-0553 affecting package gnutls for versions less than 3.8.3-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package gnutls is earlier than 3.8.3-1, affected by CVE-2024-0553
